11.content:
One morning, Izuku wakes up in his dorm room, feeling very strange. He could see every peice of All Might merchandise throught the entire room. He could see everything! Panicing, he tried calling out for help, only to find no mouth to make noise.

[W-What's going on?!]

He tried moving, sliding off the bed and onto the floor. Then, moving towards the mirror, he sticks to the side of it and rolls up, to discover he's a small, green blob of slime! Freaking out, he falls onto the floor

[Is... is this my initial quirk..?]

He decides that someone may be able to help him, and rolls over to the door, squeezing under it and into one of the dorm's hallways. But... who should he go to?

112.content:
Izuku flopped onto the ground and rolled across the hallway. Luckily it was still early, so no one was up.


This feels so weird to move, he thought to himself.

After deciding where to go, he decides to go to Tsuyu Asui. She was used to having mutant quirks which change your body, so maybe she can help him.

He rolled into her room and tried to yell, then remembering that he couldn't talk.

Somewhat angry at this, he crawled onto the bed next to the sleeping Tsuyu. He tried to wake her up by shaking her, but something weird happened. He suddenly felt himself seep into her skin!

What's happening? he thought, horrified. Everything went black for a few seconds when suddenly he could see again.

"Ugh... what was that?" he heard himself say. Rather, it wasn't his voice... it was Tsuyu! He got excited and said, "Tsuyu, you're a--"

Suddenly, he realized the voice was coming from himself. He looked at his hands. They were big and boney... like Tsuyu's!

"What's happening..." he said out loud. He turned to a mirror to see none other than Tsuyu Asui looking back at him!

"What the hell?!" he said, suddenly, hopping up. "How did this happen? Am I Tsuyu?!" he shouted.

He looked at his reflections - it was true, he was Tsuyu. She was wearing a night gound and slippers. He looked at her body - and more specifically, his womanly parts. He looked down and saw two lumps on his chest.

"T..Tsuyu's boobs!" he whimpered, grabbing them. They felt... good, oddly. Suddenly, he took his hands off.

"This is wrong, I can't... hmmm.." he stated, "Maybe a very quick peak... for scientific purposes! I must learn to use this! Besides, it's likely a dream anyways."

He slowly took off her night gound to reveal her boobs in a white bra and her panties. He looked down her whole body - her nice cleavage, her empty waist, and her beautiful butt. He felt so guilty and felt like he should have left her alone... if he knew how.

He grabbed her boobs again and moaned softly. "This feels so weird and different..." he quietly said. He also noticed how unusual it was to talk with her tongue being so long. He played with it for a minute, snickering.

Suddenly, he heard a voice from his head. What's happening? Why is my body moving on its own?! it said. It sounded horrified. Tsuyu must have still been aware of this!
112.title: Tsyu knows what it's like to have a mutant ...

113.content:
[Ashido-san's quirk is slightly like this... Maybe she could help...]

Midoriya slid under his door, through the buildings, and into Mina's dorm. After sliding in under her door, he spotted her on her bed, still sleeping.

[I guess I have to get her attention...Somehow...]

Using his slimy body, he was able to stick to one of the bed's legs, and climbed up, ending right next to her head.

[Wait... How do I talk like this... oh no... I guess my best chance is to wake her up, anyway]

Moving closer, he tried bumping into her face, only to be sucked into her gaping mouth from her inhaling. The next moment, he opens his eyes, feeling more normal, but not fully.

[I'm back to normal? I feel a little different... but it's been a bit since I've had limbs, so maybe that's it... I should still ask Ashido-san about what happened]

He shifted onto his side, trying to find her, only to nearly jump in shock at what he saw.

A pink arm
Her pink arm
His pink arm

He twitched his fingers, making complete sure it was his arm, and the fingers did exactly that. He was, without a doubt, using this arm.
Almost reluctantly, he slowly looked down to the rest of his body, only to be met with two bright pink, fleshy orbs covered by the girl's purple tank top.

[Am... Am I... Ashido-san..?]

Sitting up on the edge of the bed, he had to decide what to do now...

153.content:
Mineta woke up in one fateful day to a surprise. He could see all around him, 360 degrees in every direction. This of course caused him worry, since he didn't understand what this is. He freaked out and ran, or rather rolled, out of his room from under his door.

In the hallway, he continued his freak out until he saw...
153.title: Mineta

1531.content:
He leapt towards the unaware Uraraka. She began to yawn due to her alarm waking her up earlier than she would like. As she did so, Mineta landed right in her mouth, causing both to black out momentarily.

When Mineta awoke, he noticed no one else around, he guessed that Uraraka had ignored him and continued on her day.

"That's so rude of her!" Mineta said to himself, pouting, only to find that it wasn't his voice that came out, "Uraraka!?"

He looked down to his hands and chest, only to find they were not his own, but Uraraka's as well!

"T-t-this..." Mineta stuttered to himself, his body shaking as he examined himself. Her clothes, her legs, her everything were all his also, "THIS IS AWESOME!"

He yelled to himself, a manic look in his eyes. He took both of his hands and grabbed at his chest, forcefully squeezing Uraraka's ample bosom. He laughed so hard he cried, this was a dream come true for him. He finally had a girl he could do anything he wanted to!

Mineta dashed to his room, locking the door behind him. What to do first.

info.brief_description: The students of U.A. Academy are in for a suprise when one discovers a new, secret quirk
info.description:
A student of U.A. wakes up one day and discovers a new, hidden quirk: they can turn into slime and possess people!

-------RULES-------
No death or extreme violence (except with the Toga path)
No ending the story: If I see that a story has finished, I'll end it.
I reserve the right to erase any chapter and add more rules.

Edit: This made the first page of a "possession" search! Thank you, all you viewers, for this personal milestone!
